title: Sell Concert Tickets Online
description: A customer wants to purchase four tickets for an upcoming concert through the venue's website.

tasks.description: Help the customer select four adjacent seats in a specific section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds four tickets from the selected section to the customer's cart.

tasks.description: Process the credit card payment for the tickets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully completes the financial transaction.

tasks.description: Deliver the digital tickets to the customer's email address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends an email containing the QR codes for the four tickets.
